org.apache.distributedlog.service

Class DistributedLogClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.distributedlog.service.DistributedLogClientBuilder

  • public final class DistributedLogClientBuilder
extends Object
    Builder to build DistributedLogClient.

                                                   String... remotes)
        Finagle name strs to access proxy services.

        remotes - remote server sets.
        Returns:
        client builder.

      • uri

        public DistributedLogClientBuilder uri(URI uri)
        URI to access proxy services.

        Assuming the write proxies are announced under `.write_proxy` of the provided namespace uri. The builder will convert the dl uri (e.g. distributedlog://{zkserver}/path/to/namespace) to zookeeper serverset based finagle name str (`zk!{zkserver}!/path/to/namespace/.write_proxy`)

        Parameters:
        uri - namespace uri to access the serverset of write proxies
        Returns:
        distributedlog builder

        public DistributedLogClientBuilder maxRedirects(int redirects)
        Max redirects that is allowed per request.

        If redirects are exhausted, fail the request immediately.

        Parameters:
        redirects - max redirects allowed before failing a request.
        Returns:
        client builder.

      • handshakeWithClientInfo

        public DistributedLogClientBuilder handshakeWithClientInfo(boolean enabled)
        Whether to use the new handshake endpoint to exchange ownership cache.

        Enable this when the servers are updated to support handshaking with client info.

        Parameters:
        enabled - new handshake endpoint is enabled.
        Returns:
        client builder.

      • periodicHandshakeIntervalMs

        public DistributedLogClientBuilder periodicHandshakeIntervalMs(long intervalMs)
        Set the periodic handshake interval in milliseconds.

        Every intervalMs, the DL client will handshake with existing proxies again. If the interval is less than ownership sync interval, the handshake won't sync ownerships. Otherwise, it will.

        Parameters:
        intervalMs - handshake interval
        Returns:
        client builder.
        See Also:
        periodicOwnershipSyncIntervalMs(long)

      • periodicOwnershipSyncIntervalMs

        public DistributedLogClientBuilder periodicOwnershipSyncIntervalMs(long intervalMs)
        Set the periodic ownership sync interval in milliseconds.

        If periodic handshake is enabled, the handshake will sync ownership if the elapsed time is larger than sync interval.

        Parameters:
        intervalMs - interval that handshake should sync ownerships.
        Returns:
        client builder
        See Also:
        periodicHandshakeIntervalMs(long)

      • periodicDumpOwnershipCache

        public DistributedLogClientBuilder periodicDumpOwnershipCache(boolean enabled)
        Enable/Disable periodic dumping ownership cache.
        Parameters:
        enabled - flag to enable/disable periodic dumping ownership cache
        Returns:
        client builder.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        client builder
